title: Interpretation of seeing a dream about eating chocolate for single and married women

preview.html: Eating chocolate in a dream Many people like to eat chocolate, especially for adults and children, but when one sees eating chocolate in a dream, this vision has many meanings, so we will clarify all the different meanings mentioned by dream interpreters about eating chocolate for every girl, woman or man in a dream. Interpretation Seeing a dog in a dream. Interpretation of seeing white chocolate in a dream: Eating white chocolate in a dream for one person may indicate the approach of marriage in the near future. As for the person concerned who suffers from heartache and sadness, eating white chocolate indicates that he will get rid of these sorrows and worries and change his life to a better one. Joys and happiness, God willing. White chocolate in general can be a sign of the good reputation and aromatic biography of the dreamer. Buying white chocolate indicates good and cheerful news that the dreamer will hear in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about cumin in a dream. The meaning of seeing yourself eating dark chocolate In the dream interpretations of dreams, dark chocolate is a sign that the dreamer is entering into a new romantic love experience that will end in marriage, God willing. Dark chocolate also indicates a lot of nutrients that the dreamer will reach without putting in much effort. Offering dark chocolate to people in a dream indicates On the arrival of a happy occasion for the dreamer, which may be marriage, success, or promotion in his current job. Receiving chocolate from a person known to the dreamer indicates that it benefits that person. Interpretation of seeing a dream about the color green in a dream. Interpretation of seeing eating chocolate in a dream for a girl OneDream interpreters believe that a gift of beloved chocolates to one girl in a dream indicates that this lover has a desire to marry this girl. Some interpreters believe that a girl who sees herself buying chocolates in a dream may be suffering from an emotional crisis or feeling emotional emptiness in her current life. Eating delicious chocolate could indicate that this girl has reached the dreams and desires that she was searching for for a long time in the previous period. However, if the chocolate that the girl is eating is not delicious in taste, this indicates that this girl has gone through some problems, crises and difficulties. Interpretation of seeing the color gray in a dream. The meaning of eating chocolate in a dream for a married woman. Dream interpreters believe that a married woman eating delicious chocolate indicates a state of emotional stability in this woman’s life. If the dreamer is pregnant, then eating white chocolate in a dream indicates that she will give birth A baby girl, but if the chocolate is the same, it means that she will give birth to a male child. A married woman who buys chocolate in a dream indicates that she will fulfill her dreams that she was looking for in the previous days. If a married woman disagrees with her husband, then the husband who gives her chocolate in the dream pridect

title: Interpretation of seeing facial hair removed in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of removing hair from the face in a dream, as this vision is considered one of the puzzling visions for all individuals, as it can carry many interpretations that deserve praise and are considered important for the pioneer, or this dream could be one of the disturbing dreams that includes explanations and explanations that are not appreciated. Absolutely popular with the viewer, and in this article we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing hair removed from the face in a dream, according to what interpretation scholars said. Explanation. The interpretation of seeing hair removed from the face in a dream, as this vision may indicate that the dreamer will get rid of all the problems that surround him in this life, as it includes many explanations and interpretations, some of which are praiseworthy, and here we explain the interpretation. Seeing facial hair removed in The dream is also: According to what Ibn Sirin explained, seeing hair removed in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will be relieved of sorrows and worries in life. Also, removing hair from the face in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will achieve many profits in his professional life, and God is Most High and knows this. Imam Ibn Sirin also explained the vision of removing short hair from the face. It is evidence of the fortuneteller’s good morals. Removing facial hair, especially removing eyebrow hair. It indicates that the dreamer wants to always appear good-looking and elegant, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of dreams for a phone Broken in a dream for single, married, and pregnant women. Interpretation of a dream about removing facial hair for single women. Seeing facial hair removed in a dream for an unmarried girl is considered one of the good visions that carry many interpretations, meanings, and connotations that are mostly positive and good. Along these lines, we explain the interpretation of a dream about removing facial hair for single women. It is also If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is removing hair from her face, this is a sign of an improvement in her financial condition and an increase in her wealth in the near future, and God is Most High and All-Knowing of that. But if she sees herself in her sleep removing hair from her body, this dream is evidence of the expansion of her business, then she You will open many projects in the near future and spend a lot of money on them, and in return you will reap a lot of profits, and God is Great and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of dreams about touching the vagina in a dream for single, married, and pregnant women. Interpretation of a dream about removing facial hair with thread for a married woman, as seeing a woman’s hair being removed For a married woman, it includes many explanations and interpretations that vary based on those details that appear in the dream and based on the tool used to remove it, and here we also explain the interpretation of a dream about removing facial hair with thread for a married woman. It consists of the following: Seeing facial hair removed with thread in a dream for a married woman. It is evidence of her divorce. From the husband, especially if there are serious problems between them. It also indicates a deepening of the gap in their relationship to the point where reconciliation is not possible. In addition to seeing facial hair removed with thread. It is an indication that the wife will face a major problem in her life. Which will lead to loss. A lot of money. Also

title: I dreamed that my husband married Ali, and I was upset with Shirin’s son

preview.html: I dreamed that my husband married me and I was upset by Ibn Sirin. The dream of the husband's marriage is a disturbing dream for many women because it causes great anxiety for the owner of this vision, especially if the woman loves the husband very much and is afraid of his marriage to her, but when this dream is in the dream, it can be an expression of happiness as well as the intensity of the husband's love for her, and through this article we will learn about my dream that my husband married me and I was upset by Ibn Sirin and all the interpretations and indications related to it. I dreamed that my husband married me and I was upset by Ibn Sirin The husband's marriage to his wife is considered one of the most difficult aspects that all women go through in their lives, and even when they see it happening, even in their dreams, it can cause him many mysterious manifestations and search for interpretation. From this dream. The interpretation of the dream of the husband's marriage from Ibn Sirin came as follows: And the interpretation of my husband's dream that he married a woman I do not know, and the interpretation of this is that the husband will become closer to his heart and mind to you and his children, as he is very attached to you and to you. Presence: Where the devil whispers that another woman will come and take him from you, but you have to deny those myths that are going on in your mind. And if a woman sees that she married someone else and cried and was wronged, then this is considered good news, and that she will have a lot of money and will live a rational life, and that is also through trade. If he is a merchant, and crying in a dream is considered a great comfort that will happen to the dreamer, not as bad as many of you think. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about the separation of a family member in a dream Interpretation of a dream that my husband married me and his wife is pregnant Because the nature of women brought many secrets and qualities that are similar to most women, which lie in the husband’s jealousy, and that a woman dreams of her husband or even his marriage to someone else, and this dream has many different interpretations, and the interpretation of the dream of the husband’s marriage and his pregnant wife is as follows: And if a woman sees her husband in a dream and he is married and his wife is pregnant, then God gives them delicious and delicious food, and the more beautiful the woman is, the better, and the more, and the more. It is also said: If a woman sees in her dream that her husband married her and his wife was pregnant, and she considered its importance great, then pregnancy in a dream is considered abundant and great and never ending, and this is for her. And her husband because she is pregnant very soon, her husband can increase his work and earn a lot of money in trade as well, or she will pay him a lot of money. See also: Interpretation of a dream about cutting off a hand in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying his brother's wife Where a woman sees that her husband married another woman with her, this is one of the dreams that haunts many women, and many scholars of interpretation agreed that this dream has many different interpretations, and the interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying his brother's wife is as follows: If a pregnant woman sees her husband in a dream and he is married to a beautiful woman and more beautiful than her, then this is considered a sign of determining the sex of the fetus, because she will give birth to a very beautiful girl and God knows best in this dream. If a woman sees that her husband has married a woman before

title: Interpretation of a dream about going to the doctor in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of going to the doctor in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of the dream of going to the doctor in a dream, and it is one of the interpretations that some people want to know the meaning of this dream and if it is a sign of good or evil. The reality of the dream and its good interpretation is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of the dream of going to the doctor in A dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he went to the doctor in a dream, can indicate happy events that will come to the dreamer in those days. Seeing going to the doctor in a dream may indicate a lot of money and an extensive diet that the dreamer will receive during this time. In case My personal opinion is that he went to the doctor in a dream, as this may indicate upcoming joys for the dreamer in those days. A person’s vision may indicate that he went to the doctor in a dream, which may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about going to the sea in a dream: Going to the calm sea in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s good offspring, thanks to God’s grace. In the event that one sees that he entered the calm sea, this may indicate a lot of money that the dreamer received at that time. If someone sees that he He went to the sea, as this may indicate the family stability he was enjoying at that time. If one sees that he is bathing in the sea, this may indicate good skin that the dreamer will acquire in the coming period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about moving to joy in a dream may Seeing someone who went out to have fun in a new suit indicates some positive changes that occurred in his life during this period. Seeing someone out can mean that he is about to rejoice. It may indicate that he heard happy news coming to the dreamer in those days. In the case of his personal view that he went to joy and had a lot of music and songs that could indicate the material stumbles that the dreamer faced at that time. The transition to joy, music and singing may It indicates some problems that the dreamer may face during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about going to the market in a dream Going to the market in a dream can indicate a person’s success in his field of work, thanks to God. In the event that a person thinks that he went to the market, this may indicate To a high position that the dreamer reached during this period. Seeing yourself going to the market in a dream may indicate many material gains that the dreamer achieved in those days. If one sees that he went to the market in a dream, this may indicate getting rid of The difficulty that the dreamer faces in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about going to the dentist in a dream: Going to the dentist in a dream may indicate some problems that the dreamer faces during this time. In the case of his personal point of view on going to the dentist, this may indicate Indicates financial difficulties that the dreamer may face at that time. A dream about a person who went to the dentist in a dream may indicate the same bad condition that he is suffering from.

title: What is the interpretation of a married woman’s dream about changing her house according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about changing a house for a married womanThe greatest interpreters of dream science are mentioned in this article, so if a woman needs to know the meaning of a dream about changing a house? Or move it? Or get a new home in a dream? You should read the following carefully. You can find what you want easily and conveniently. Interpretation of a dream about changing a house for a married womanAll dream interpretation books have explained that seeing a dream about changing a house in a married woman’s dream is a sign of her inner desire to change her lifestyle and that she wants to improve her standard of living. She tries to find the right things for her and her family. Seeing the house changing in a woman’s dream proves how stable she feels with her husband and family. She wants to enter a different house in her dream and indicates that the situation will change for the better except for the abundance of food. Interpretation of the dream of changing the house for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in a dream about changing the house for a woman that it symbolizes the transformations that will occur in her life fundamentally, and from her house she will recover, God willing. When a married woman notices when changing her house in a dream that it is full of iron, this proves the blessing of life and that she will be in obedience to God. The condition of the house if the dreamer is in a financial crisis and she sees herself changing the house in which she lives in her dream, which suggests to her that the doors of livelihood will be opened. Through Google, you can join us on a website about the secrets of dream interpretation and you will find everything you are looking for. Interpretation of a dream about changing a house for a pregnant woman When a pregnant woman dreams that she has moved into her house, this symbolizes salvation from a difficult period for her and her need for pleasure. You are passing through, but you will succeed in this by God’s grace. When a dreamer sees that she is buying a house in a dream, this means the good and wonderful life that she will live with her children and family and that she will be free of any pain, sadness, or negative feeling throughout her life, and therefore this vision of a pregnant woman is considered a sign To change her lifestyle for the better, and therefore there is no need to worry or let fear enter her heart so that it does not affect the health of the fetus. Interpretation of a dream about changing residence for a married woman When a married woman sees in her dream that she is changing the house in which she lives, this indicates a change in her current lifestyle and that she will manage her life in a reasonable way. You are doing the right thing that shows your maturity. If the dreamer feels pleasure in the dream when changing his place of residence, this indicates his strong desire to acquire something, whether on a professional or personal level, and therefore it is better for her to calculate her actions and make plans. He can achieve what he aspires to. Interpretation of a dream about moving to an old house for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about moving into an old house in a married woman’s dream is a sign of disagreements between her and her family and she may find some difficulties during her life, but she will overcome them with a little patience. Get over it. When a woman sees that she is moving from one house to another but it is dilapidated and there is no point in staying in it while she sleeps, she expresses the random thoughts that invade her mind and this is reflected in her dream. To injury or not

title: What is the interpretation of seeing dough in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you a complete interpretation of the test you saw in a dream. It is known that dough is made from flour and is fermented to make bread, tablets and desserts. Leading scholars, interpretations of dreams and visions, like ours, adapt the interpretation of seeing dough in dough in a dream for healthy, married and pregnant women, as well as for men. If you are interested in the interpretation, then you should follow the article. What is the dream of dough by Ibn Sirin? Seeing whole dough in a dream is generally good news As the great scholar Ibn Sirin said in his book, dough in a dream testifies to money, food, and legitimate goodness, and it is also a reason for the dreamer to do many things. . And quick profits. But incomplete or fermented dough in a dream indicates bad work in the dreamer’s life, and it may also indicate loss of money and lack of livelihood with them. Rotten dough in a dream indicates losses and poverty. Why dream that you are kneading barley dough in a full dream shows a righteous person who predicts many successes and successes at work and in life in general, which indicates a new, better job and the dreamer enjoys a happy life without problems and worries. Why Dreaming of kneading a dead person in a dream is complete evidence of the kindness and good deeds that benefit the deceased after his death. See also: Why does a sieve dream in a complete dream? A dream of kneading individual dough. Why do single women dream of kneading dough in a complete dream, preparing it, kneading it and putting it in the oven to ripen. What is the interpretation of a vision? The dough is in the hands of the world and it was cohesive - this is evidence that she is a girl of good morals and religion, and the evidence of this vision is great good for her and satisfaction for everyone. Desires and goals. What she aspired to in life. In addition to what is the interpretation of seeing a common woman cutting dough, that is, sweets and cakes, it indicates her joy and happiness, and her news dough indicates her great support for her. See also: Why do you dream of seeing bread in a dream? Why does a married woman dream of kneading dough? Life and in her life. Family. Also, dreaming of barley dough indicates that good things will happen to her in her life. title: What is the interpretation of lettuce in a dream and its meaning?

preview.html: Lettuce, beloved by adults and children, is considered a special vegetable and is characterized by many health benefits, and its presence in a dream has many interpretations that vary depending on the psychological and social state of the dreamer, even according to what the interpreter sees his vision from one world to another. Lettuce in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Al-Sadiq indicated that if The dreamer picks lettuce in his dream, this is a sign that he wants all good things to be only for him, which means that he is a selfish personality and therefore he will feel sorry for everyone. Whenever he sees someone who is better than him or in a higher position than him. If the fiancée eats lettuce in her dream, this vision shows quarrels with her fiancé that did not reach the point of separation or annulment of the engagement. That is, the dream means the superficial problems that will arise between them, but because of their greatness. love. They will overcome them, God willing. If the dreamer sees in a dream a tree throwing lettuce, this is a relief that he will succeed, but the tree should not be cut down in the dream, otherwise a fire will break out in it, so the positive interpretation of the dream will come true, God willing. Whenever it appears Lettuce in a dream is full of mud and dirt, the more the dreamer’s life is full of difficult circumstances and miserable days. Interpretation of a dream about eating lettuce: Lettuce can be seen by the single, the married, the pregnant, and the divorced. Therefore, we will present the interpretation of each case in its various forms: Eating lettuce in a married woman’s dream: This vision did not have an ominous connotation, as the jurists indicated that she would reap the fruits of her work and find herself successful on the professional and personal levels, and the dream gives an indication to the dreamer that this success will come with a great responsibility that must be fulfilled. To bear it completely, because there is never success and excellence without a price or tax that must be paid, and the dream contains a very important indication that the dreamer has suffered from bad thoughts and great negative energy and will soon find herself able to recover from these destructive thoughts. Life will be revived with more positive energy, kindness, and peace. Eating lettuce during a pregnant woman’s sleep: If a pregnant woman sees this vision in her dream, its interpretation will be promising, because it indicates that she will obtain money from many places, and perhaps she will work in more than one job in addition to her husband’s livelihood. And her money. Which will increase and thus he will find more money than he expected. Eating lettuce in a dream for a divorced woman: There is no doubt that many divorced women live a bitter life after divorce due to their bad emotional and marital experiences, but a dream of eating lettuce in a dream is a sign that all her suffering will end and she will live a balanced life without worry. . Or problems. Eating lettuce in a widow’s dream: A large number of widows find it difficult to manage their livelihood, especially after the death of their husband, and they suffer from loneliness and distress, in addition to the pain that their children suffer after the death of their father. They disappear after the widow dreams that she is eating fresh lettuce, except that she will find a solution to the financial plight she was living with. A single or married man eating lettuce in a dream: The jurists pointed out that this dream is evidence of God’s powerful temptation, as the dreamer will find himself in a calamity or misfortune. Touched

Touched

title: Interpretation of seeing men sitting in a dream has different interpretations

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about men sitting in a dream with different interpretations, sitting with the right people, talking to them, and exchanging the right experiences is one of the important things that a person must do in his life, and the Sunnah of the Prophet is full of prophetic and prophetic hadiths. Stories that explain the importance of choosing the people with whom we sit. Many situations appear in dreams that express a person’s personality, such as sitting with certain people. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of the dream of men sitting in a dream with different interpretations. Interpretation of the dream of seeing male sitting in a dream. When the dreamer sees that there are men’s councils somewhere in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will witness that this place was built inside the court, provided that the reading of the Qur’an is correct. Also, when the dreamer sees that somewhere there are male councils and poems are being circulated in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will receive an invalid order. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mihrab in a dream When the dreamer sees himself praying at the mihrab in a dream, he may This indicates that the dreamer will achieve goodness for him. Also, when the dreamer sees himself praying in the mihrab in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will have a male child. When the dreamer sees himself performing the prayer in the mihrab, but not at the time specified in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will He will do good for those who come after him. Also, when you see the dreamer and a pregnant woman praying in the mihrab in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will have a male child. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pulpit in a dream When the dreamer sees himself standing on the pulpit and addressing people with words of truth in a dream, it may indicate This means that the dreamer will rise if he is qualified to ascend the pulpit. Also, when the dreamer sees himself standing on the pulpit and addressing people with words of truth in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be famous for his righteousness if he is not qualified to ascend the pulpit. • When you see the dreamer standing on the pulpit and addressing people with bad words in a dream, this may mean that the dreamer will be crucified. Also, when the dreamer sees that a ruler or sultan stands on the pulpit and preaches to the people and then breaks it in the dream, this may mean that the dreamer will witness the death of that ruler. • When the dreamer sees that the ruler stands on the pulpit and delivers a sermon to the people and then breaks it in the dream, This may indicate that the dreamer will witness the dismissal of that ruler. Also, when the dreamer sees that a ruler stands on the pulpit and gives a sermon to the people and then breaks it in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will witness the death of that person’s kingship.• When you see the dreamer standing on the pulpit and addressing the people during the Hajj period in the dream, it may indicate This means that the dreamer will suffer from some misfortunes. Also, when the dreamer sees himself standing on the pulpit and preaching to people during the Hajj period in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will speak well about him.• When you see the dreamer standing on the pulpit and preaching

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing red bricks in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing red bricks in a dream: Seeing red bricks in a dream indicates ambition, high development, and high appreciation. Also, seeing red medicine in a dream indicates happiness and the death of all worries and problems. If a person sees in his dream that he is buying red bricks, this indicates love conflicts. It indicates a collapse The red brick on the wall of the fortuneteller’s car indicates that he will get several new jobs. Interpretation of a dream about making red bricks for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees a red brick in her dream, this indicates when she will approach engagement with one of her relatives. Seeing assembling white bricks in a dream indicates death Concerns and achieving the desired, success and excellence for the girl. However, if she sees red bricks falling from the sky, this indicates the girl’s disobedience and disobedience to God Almighty. Dreaming of seeing bricks thrown at an unmarried girl indicates the abundance of enemies and their victory over her and frequent talk about lies. Interpretation of seeing a dream about red bricks in A dream about a married woman: If a married woman sees herself collecting red bricks in a dream, this indicates her disobedience to her husband. Also, in a dream about lifting bricks from a married woman, it indicates that she will enter into a relationship with a stubborn and cruel person. Perhaps seeing a married woman carrying bricks in a dream means That she will give birth and give birth to a child who is healthy from all diseases. Likewise, if she dreams that she is hitting her husband with a brick, this indicates many disagreements and problems between her and her husband. Interpretation of seeing a dream about red bricks in a pregnant woman’s dream. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is carrying red bricks to build a new house, then this It indicates the end of all her troubles and the ease of her birth. Also, seeing red bricks in a dream indicates that she will give birth to a child, God willing. And if she sees red bricks falling from the sky in her dream, this indicates psychological comfort for the woman. If one sees that someone is preparing bricks In a dream, this indicates many disagreements and problems. Interpretation of seeing a dream about red bricks in a man’s dream. Interpretation of seeing red bricks stacked for men in a dream is evidence that he will soon marry the girl of his dreams. If a married man sees in his dream that he is building white bricks, this It indicates a broad diet. Seeing bricks in a dream generally indicates the collapse of problems and fears for the pioneer and the marriage of an unmarried young man. Seeing someone beating a young man in a dream indicates the obstacles and crises he faces with his companions. Dream interpretation of my house built with clay bricks. Seeing yourself building a house Of mud bricks indicates good work and access to new government jobs. Falling bricks in a dream indicates many sorrows, problems, difficulties, or the death of a close person. Also, seeing bricks for someone in a dream means good health, abundant nutrition, and love. Interpretation of a dream about building with red bricks: Seeing a building of Red bricks in a dream is one of the dreams that indicate that the dreamer will fulfill a wish he was making. Also, seeing a mosque built with red bricks in a dream is an omen of goodness and great happiness. Also, seeing in a dream a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing money in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing money in a dream or dreaming through a website: Looking at the roy2a.com website, money is the currency in which transactions are exchanged, and money varies from one country to another. Paper money and other metals are also available, and it should be noted that money in dreams is one of the most common things, and today we will present the most important interpretations given by leading scholars and dream interpreters, such as Ibn Sirin al-Nabulsi. And Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of seeing money in the sky and what it means for different people, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream. Seeing paper money in a dream is good news when a security inspection or when a traveler returns. To see money in a dream means that soon something nice will happen to the viewer. If someone sees He takes a banknote, and it is nice for a male child to come to him. If he loses money, this is a sign of the illness of one of his children. Seeing a lack of money after calculating it in a dream indicates the losses that the dreamer will experience in his life, whether material or at work. Seeing money and showing off about it In front of people, it indicates the dreamer’s sins and transgressions. Seeing old money and melted money in a dream indicates poverty and need. Seeing obtaining coins in a dream indicates food and many good things for the dreamer to come. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a toothpick in a dream. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that Seeing money in a dream indicates common interests between people. Seeing money on the road in front of the fortuneteller is a sign of sadness and problems, the amount of which depends on the amount of money in the dream. If one sees that he is bringing money to his home, it is an indication that he will get money soon. If one sees that he He earns from his home and puts it in another place, a sign of the destruction of his worries and problems. Seeing paper money in a dream indicates that in dreams and wishes, the fortuneteller seeks, plans, and trades. A vision of receiving money from a dead person so that the dreamer devotes himself to the interests that the deceased spent. See other interpretations: Interpretation of the vision of collecting coins Minerals from the ground in a dream. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream for a single woman. Seeing this money found on the road for single women is for problems and obstacles that she will face in the near future. Seeing bundles of money in a girl’s dream is an indication of her future livelihood. Seeing collecting money in one dream is an indication to me that she is dealing well with Her future and she will have a happy future. A vision of taking money from a young man in one dream. In their engagement soon, and if the money is new, she will be happier with it. A vision of donating money in one dream, indicating his cooperation and participation so that the world can fulfill its needs. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream for a married woman. Seeing money in The dream of a married woman indicates her need for help, whether physical or psychological. Seeing yourself counting money in a dream indicates to a married woman that she is able to take over the affairs of her home and manage her affairs. Seeing the theft of money from her husband in a dream indicates that a married woman is in dire need of things from her husband, whether It was physical
